creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: two sections--top and bottom--with four lines of text each, with alternating lines beginning at different levels; short line of text at left, LLQ; two red seals below short line of text; red oval seal, URC
text: The pine wind Is sure to blow— Full blossoms Patches of clouds Shown us as we wait— Cuckoo Mid-autumn moon— Beneath trees and grasses Someone’s shadow Breaking a dish Where has the sound gone' Evening snow
title: (Four Seasons Haiku)
